name: TEA-TRICA BHA foam
description: A deep cleansing foam with BHA and Tea tree unclogs pores and exfoliates dead skin cells, leaving a refreshed finish.
KeyIngredient: Centella Asiatica Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Water, Salicylic Acid, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Chamaecyparis Obtusa Water

name: Green Tea Cleansing Foam
description: A gentle cleansing foam formulated with Jeju green tea extract that thoroughly removes impurities while keeping the skin hydrated.
KeyIngredient: Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid

name: Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser
description: A gentle gel-type cleanser with a low pH that effectively cleanses without stripping the skin’s natural oils, perfect for sensitive skin.
KeyIngredient: Saccharomyces Ferment, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Betaine Salicylate

name: Rice Water Bright Foaming Cleanser
description: A brightening cleansing foam enriched with rice water that gently cleanses and hydrates for a radiant complexion.
KeyIngredient: Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid

name: Super Volcanic Pore Micellar Cleansing Foam
description: A deep cleansing foam with Jeju volcanic clusters and micellar particles to remove impurities and control sebum.
KeyIngredient: Jeju Volcanic Cluster, Glycerin, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid

name: Blueberry Rebalancing 5.5 Cleanser
description: A rebalancing cleanser with a pH level of 5.5 that helps maintain the skin’s natural acidity while providing a fresh and hydrated finish.
KeyIngredient: Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid

name: Egg White Pore Foam
description: A pore-refining cleanser with egg white extract that removes dirt and oil while minimizing the appearance of pores.
KeyIngredient: Albumen Extract, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid

name: Bija Trouble Facial Foam
description: A trouble-care cleansing foam containing bija seed oil that helps soothe and care for troubled skin.
KeyIngredient: Torreya Nucifera Seed Oil, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid

name: AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser
description: A daily exfoliating cleanser with AHA and BHA that helps remove dead skin cells and unclog pores for a clearer complexion.
KeyIngredient: Glycolic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Betula Alba Juice, Tea Tree Leaf Oil

name: Miracle Cleansing Foam
description: A miracle foam cleanser that contains AHA, BHA, and PHA to deeply cleanse and exfoliate for clearer skin.
KeyIngredient: Salicylic Acid, Niacinamide, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract

name: Anua Heartleaf Succinic Moisture Cleansing Foam
description: Designed for sensitive and acne-prone skin, this gel-type cleansing foam is infused with 10,000ppm of heartleaf extract and protease to gently remove dead skin cell.
KeyIngredient: Anti-acne: Salicylic Acid ; Antioxidant: Houttuynia Cordata Extract (10,000Ppm) ; Exfoliant: Salicylic Acid

name: Isntree Onion Newpair Cleansing Foam
description: A spot care cleansing foam that helps treat blemishes and spots at one time. Enriched with Muan Red Onion Extract to tackle blemishes and create a protective barrier to protect the skin. Formulated with NoSCalm Complex (Sodium heparin, Allantoin, Panthenol, and Heartleaf Houttuynia) to soothe sensitive, irritated skin. Contains Tranexamic Acid and Vitamin C derivatives to even skin tone and tackle pigmentation. The rich and firm foam help remove skin impurities effectively.
KeyIngredient: Anti-acne: Lauric Acid, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate ; Antioxidant: Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate

name: Round Lab Birch Moisturizing Cleanser
KeyIngredient: Betula Platyphylla Japonica Juice(10,000ppm),Artemisia Annua Extract,Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil,Hyarulonic Acid

name: iUNIK Centella Mild Cleansing Foam
description: PH BALANCED CLEANSER: Mild cleanser with pH level 5.5, hypoallergenic. This gentle cleanser won't leave your skin dry. Gently facewash that removes resides and makeup . Great as a second cleanse for makeup removal

name: AXIS-Y Sunday Morning Refreshing Cleansing Foam
description: AXIS-Y cleansing foam is set at pH 5.5 to cleanse the skin of dirt, excess oils, and other impurities deep in the pores without stripping the skin. With its special patent skincare technology, Aquaxyl, this cleansing foam keeps the skin moisturized and balanced. Our enhanced formula features the addition of even more moisturizing agents to guarantee a clean, yet fully moisturized feeling. We added double the amount of birch sap, as well as perilla leaf extract, rice bran, and heartleaf to leave your skin supple and dewy.
KeyIngredient: Aqua (Water) Glycerin, sodium cocoyl isethionate, sodium methyl cocoyl taurate, potassium cocoyl glycinate,Coco-Betaine, POTASSIUM COCOATE Polyquaternium-67.

name: Mary&May White Collagen Cleansing Foam
description: A sorbet-textured cleansing balm packed with 1% Niacinamide, 46.6% Collagen, vitamin C, B and E that gently melts away makeup, sebum and impurities without stripping the skin, revealing a bright and translucent complexion.
KeyIngredient: Hydrolyzed Collagen Extract (46.6%), Myristic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Beeswax, Dipropylene Glycol, Lauryl Hydroxysultaine, Niacinamide (1%), Glyceryl Stearate SE, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol

name: Torriden DIVE-IN Low Molecular Hyaluronic Acid Cleansing Foam
description: A vegan, pH-balanced cleanser that thoroughly removes dirt, impurities and makeup residue from skin with a gentle touch.
KeyIngredient: Glycerin · Sodium Hyaluronate · Hyaluronic Acid · Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer.

name: Jumiso Pore-Purifying Salicylic Acid Foaming Cleanser
description: CLINICALLY PROVEN, NON-COMEDOGENIC - Deeply cleanses and shrinks pores for a smoother, clearer complexion.

name: Beauty of Joseon Green Plum Refreshing Cleanser
description: It contains mung bean extract that creates a synergistic effect with plum water, a natural herbal ingredient, and helps remove dead skin cells and sebum. And it is a light gel-type hypoallergenic, mildly acidic cleanser that does not dry out the skin easily and helps retain moisture.​
KeyIngredient: Water, Prunus Mume Fruit Water, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Phaseolus Radiatus Seed Extract, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Prunus Mume Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride
